Package org.eclipse.mosaic.starter

Class MosaicStarter

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.starter.MosaicStarter
public class MosaicStarter extends Object
This class contains a main method that configures a Eclipse MOSAIC simulation based on an XML file.

    • MosaicStarter

      public MosaicStarter()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Reads all information from the given XML file and starts Eclipse MOSAIC with the read parameters. If successful, the process exits with status code 0, in the case of an error with status code -1.
      Parameters:
      args - parameter list from the command line interface

    • execute

      public void execute(String[] arguments) throws MosaicStarter.ExecutionException
      Reads all information from the given XML file and starts Eclipse MOSAIC with the read parameters.
      Parameters:
      arguments - parameter list from the command line interface
      Throws:
      MosaicStarter.ExecutionException - whenever the execution is configured incorrectly

    • printUsage

      protected void printUsage(ArgumentsOptionsParser<?> cli, String error)
      Print command line related properties and exit the Eclipse MOSAIC in case of a invalid command line argument.
      Parameters:
      cli - command line into a parameter object.

    • printAndLog

      protected void printAndLog(String message)
      Log the error string and exit Eclipse MOSAIC.
      Parameters:
      message - a string representing the error message.

    • printAndLog

      protected void printAndLog(String string, Throwable reason)
      Log the error string and exit Eclipse MOSAIC.
      Parameters:
      string - a string representing the error message.
      reason - the exception which led to the error message
